title: Fear of High Places
description: The mysterious death of a woman who claimed to be the mistress of a married public figure sends Jeff and Peggy investigating.

title: Witness
description: Jean Thorndyke is the woman who knows too much - and Dan Farrell must find her before her murderous husband can silence her.

title: The Taker
description: Glenn Howard must cope with a hostile takeover bid by the unscrupulous Arthur Jellicoe.

title: Collectors' Edition
description: Dillon's life was saved in Vietnam by photographer Peter Max; now, Max is in big trouble and Dillon must help.

title: Nightmare
description: Five years after his wife was shot dead in front of him, Dan Farrell has a chance to bring her killers to justice.

title: Incident in Berlin
description: When a Howard Publications employee is jailed in East Germany for being an American spy, Glenn Howard attempts to negotiate for his release.

title: Shine On, Shine On, Jesse Gil
description: Wealthy farmer Jesse Gil Macrae is a respected, popular figure in his community - but is he also a murderer?

title: Lola in Lipstick
description: In Rome, Glenn Howard investigates the doings of the Jet Set - and also the mysterious death of a gangster's girlfriend.

title: The Protector
description: Glenn Howard takes on a right-wing multi-millionaire who may be planning some sort of coup with a private army.

title: Ordeal
description: Linda Ramsey will be executed in just a few hours - unless Dan Farrell can save her.

title: The White Birch
description: August, 1968: As the Russian tanks roll into Czechoslovakia, Glenn Howard has a chance to smuggle out the manuscript of a new book which is "political dynamite".

title: High on a Rainbow
description: Children in schools are getting access to dangerous drugs. Dan Farrell goes undercover to find the supplier.

title: The Black Answer
description: When an African-American newspaper editor, a strong advocate of non-violence, is brutally murdered, a controversial militant is suspected.

title: Pineapple Rose
description: Peggy is kidnapped - she's been mistaken for the sister of pop idol Lincoln Bridges.

title: The Revolutionary
description: In a Latin American country, Glenn Howard becomes involved in a counter-revolution.

title: Swingers Only
description: Kay Martin's husband has been mixing with some very dubious people - can the marriage be saved?

title: The Inquiry
description: When Howard is accused of stealing money during a combined OSS and resistance mission during WWII by an inimical senator at an appointment hearing, he proceeds to contact those involved in the mission to determine who took the money.

title: The Incomparable Connie Walker
description: Mayor Conway Walker is the victim of a smear campaign - or is he really corrupt?

title: Love-In at Ground Zero
description: Can Glenn Howard prevent a protest group from committing mass suicide?

title: The Suntan Mob
description: American gangsters seem close to taking over a British island in the West Indies.

title: Keep the Doctor Away
description: Could the charming Dr. Evenhauer be a killer?

title: The Bobby Currier Story
description: Bobby Currier was always trouble just waiting to happen. Now he seems to have gone on a killing spree.

title: A Wrath of Angels
description: An idealistic priest takes on a slum landlord.

title: The Third Choice
description: What is the link between the kidnapping of one of Glenn Howard's editors and an attempt to overthrow an African government?

title: An Agent of the Plaintiff
description: Whilst visiting London, Glenn Howard finds himself being sued for libel.

title: Lady on the Rocks
description: In London, Glenn Howard wonders if the marriage of an ambitious British politician is all that it seems.

title: A Hard Case of the Blues
description: Blues singer Jessie Boone seems to have been swindled out of $200,000 by her manager. The curious thing is, she doesn't seem to care.

title: Blind Man's Bluff
description: Art Traeger was blinded when someone threw acid in his face. Now, he's planning his revenge.

title: The Emissary
description: When Chinese diplomats walk out of an important international conference in Paris, Glenn Howard is tasked with the tricky job of getting them to return.

title: Chains of Command
description: Dan Farrell investigates goings-on a small rural prison whose inmates are being used as slave labor.

title: Goodbye Harry
description: Top scientist Harry Roarke has disappeared - has he fled to Cuba, as most people believe, or is he still in the United States?

title: Give Till It Hurts
description: Dan Farrell investigates charity fund-raiser Walter Grayson - and starts getting threats.

title: The Perfect Image
description: Mayor John Adrian has a squeaky-clean image and has been endorsed by Howard Publications. Might he be too good to be true?

title: The Prisoner Within
description: Jeff Dillon visits a special army establishment, where soldiers are trained to withstand torture techniques.

title: The Civilized Men
description: Dan Farrell goes to Florida to investigate a criminal enterprise involving rustled cattle and tainted meat.

title: High Card
description: Who tipped off the Cuban revolutionary government that the invasion at the Bay of Pigs was about to happen, back in 1961? An old enemy alleges it was Glenn Howard.

title: The Power
description: Dan Farrell investigates corruption on the waterfront.

title: Laurie Marie
description: When Laurie Marie goes missing, a reward is offered, attracting all kinds of strange characters.

title: The Tradition
description: On a Greek island, Glenn Howard and a young Greek woman, Thalia, face danger and possibly even death for defying an ancient tradition.

title: The Brass Ring
description: Dan Farrell befriends a young boxer and suspects he may be under pressure to throw a fight.

title: Island of Gold and Precious Stones
description: After a multi-millionaire dies, Dillon investigates the source of his vast wealth - greatly to the displeasure of certain others.

title: The Takeover
description: Howard is asked by the U.S. to assess the quality of a monk headed interim regime in which the former ruler and a friend of Howard's has disappeared on charges of treasury theft which charge Howard believes is a lie of a corrupt military.

title: The Garden
description: As a result of the residency of a friend's troubled daughter, Farrell investigates a therapy facility housed in a bucolic, isolated setting and run by a greedy and opportunistic psychiatrist.

title: Tarot
description: Soon after talking to Glenn Howard, a young woman dies - seemingly by suicide. But when Glenn discovers her links to a coven of modern-day witches, he becomes suspicious that she was murdered.

title: The King of Denmark
description: Has a lost Shakespeare manuscript been discovered? Or is it an elaborate fraud?

title: The Skin Game
description: Medical supplies destined for a small, newly-emergent African nation have been tampered with, making them useless and even dangerous. Dan Farrell investigates.

title: Man of the People
description: Cesar Rodriguez is a "man of the people", but he may not be quite as much of a populist as he seems.

title: Echo of a Nightmare
description: The death of a kidnapper just freed from prison hampers Dan Farrell's efforts to learn more about the abduction.

title: One of the Girls in Research
The Other Kind of Spy
description: Dillon investigates a company in which the research of his friend, a scientist of besmirched reputation , is being stolen and in which the company principals are less than committed to the company's success.

title: So Long, Baby, and Amen
description: Dan Farrell tries to save a girl from drug addiction.

title: A Love to Remember
description: At Forrest University's 25-year reunion, Glenn Howard encounters the beautiful, troubled Edwina Booker who claims Howard jilted her at the senior prom. After a late-night tryst she vanishes, leaving Howard to ponder her background. He soon learns from local authorities that Edwina Booker has been dead for 25 years!

title: Cynthia Is Alive and Living in Avalon
description: Cynthia was once a jet-setter, but is now a recluse living on the island of Avalon. Paul Tyler sets out to interview her.

title: Battle at Gannon's Bridge
description: Ex-convict Eddie Gannon runs a halfway house for other ex-cons trying to go straight. When a crime wave hits the area, Eddie and his friends are suspected - can Dan Farrell prove them innocent?

title: The Enemy Before Us
description: Jeff Dillon decides to revisit the scenes of his impoverished youth, and learns sadly that "you can't go home again".

title: The Time Is Now
description: Racial tensions seem likely to erupt on a campus.

title: The War Merchants
description: Dan Farrell investigates the murky world of international arms smuggling.

title: Little Bear Died Running
description: Reporter Paul Tyler investigates the murder of a Native American.

title: All the Old Familiar Faces
description: Someone is threatening Glenn Howard's life - is it the ruined arms dealer, the corrupt politician, the sleazy showbiz impresario or the phony evangelist? Or could it be someone quite different?

title: I Love You, Billy Baker: Part 1
description: Las Vegas entertainer Billy Baker doesn't like interviews - especially when they concern that girl who died so mysteriously.

title: I Love You, Billy Baker: Part 2
description: In the second half of this two-part episode, the world of entertainer Billy Baker begins to unravel completely.

title: Why I Blew Up Dakota
description: Early McCorley is on trial for the murder of an artist, one much more famous and successful than himself. Is he really as deranged as people think?

title: Aquarius Descending
description: A corrupt politician whose plans have been thwarted by Glenn Howard seeks revenge by hiring an unscrupulous young man to seduce Howard's niece.

title: The Glory Shouter
description: Popular preacher Ronald Payden has mounted a crusade - but someone is embezzling his funds.

title: A Sister from Napoli
description: Reporter Lewis Corbett investigates the reason why a prominent D.A. didn't get the judgeship he was after.

title: LA 2017
description: Mysteriously falling asleep dictating a boring plea for action on the ecology to President Nixon, while driving from an environmental summit, a publisher awakens in 2017. The GreenMilhous Effect's few survivors live underground, while the U.S. is a corporate fascist state. Needed for his virility in an increasingly sterile society, the media czar is is courted by the U.S. high command, Plutocrats who built bomb shelters. This American Kremlin, headquartered in Detroit, disdain alcohol, getting high on milk instead. They need a Goebbels to brainwash workers forced to to build war machines above ground in the poisoned atmosphere, that the U.S. is still a democracy. Will doing the Time Warp get the arrogant publisher back to 1971 to save the smoggy planet?

title: The Man Who Killed a Ghost
description: Reporter Dave Corey sets out to expose the reality behind the wholesome image of a famous cowboy star.

title: Seek and Destroy
description: Dan Farrell investigates the mysterious death of a scientist.

title: A Capitol Affair
description: Why is gossip columnist Hallie Manville trying to destroy the career of a politician?

title: The Savage Eye
description: Peggy Maxwell gets involved in environmental protest in an attempt to prevent a forest being felled by loggers.

title: Appointment in Palermo
description: Glenn Howard encounters some distinctly colorful underworld types when he visits the island of Sicily.

title: Beware of the Watchdog
description: Someone, it seems, is trying to murder a famous consumer-rights activist.

title: The Broken Puzzle
description: Governor Brill seems to run his state like a dictatorship, and doesn't like anyone to interfere with his methods.

title: The Showdown
description: Glenn Howard researches the story of one of his ancestors - a colorful Old West character.
